Body.Build: Glass front, ceramic back, aluminum frame
Body.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
Body.\u00a0: IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 6m for 30 mins)

Platform.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.19 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.75 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x2.0 GHz Cortex-A510)

Memory.Card slot: NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot)

Main Camera.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.4-f/4.0, 24mm (wide), PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
48 MP, f/3.0, 90mm (periscope telephoto macro), PDAF, OIS, 3.5x optical zoom
13 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), PDAF

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot
Comms.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)

Features.Sensors: Face ID, fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass, color spectrum
